message:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_settings` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `title` varchar(255) NULL,
 `description` varchar(255) NULL,
 `keywords` varchar(255) NULL,
 `name` varchar(255) NULL,
 `infoemail` varchar(255) NULL,
 `supportemail` varchar(255) NULL,
 `whatsapp` varchar(255) NULL,
 `skype` varchar(255) NULL,
 `url` varchar(255) NULL,
 `referral_comission` varchar(255) NULL,
 `wallet_comission` varchar(255) NULL,
 `login_to_exchange` int(11) NULL,
 `document_verification` int(11) NULL,
 `email_verification` int(11) NULL,
 `phone_verification` int(11) NULL,
 `recaptcha_verification` int(11) NULL,
 `recaptcha_publickey` varchar(255) NULL,
 `recaptcha_privatekey` varchar(255) NULL,
 `nexmo_api_key` varchar(255) NULL,
 `nexmo_api_secret` varchar(255) NULL,
 `worktime_from` varchar(255) NULL,
 `worktime_to` varchar(255) NULL,
 `worktime_gmt` varchar(255) NULL,
 `default_language` varchar(255) NULL,
 `default_template` varchar(255) NULL,
 `operator_status` int(11) NULL,
 `footer_information` text NULL,
 `license_key` text NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_users_deposits` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `uid` int(11) NULL,
 `amount` varchar(255) NULL,
 `currency` varchar(255) NULL,
 `gateway_id` varchar(255) NULL,
 `payment_hash` varchar(255) NULL,
 `txid` varchar(255) NULL,
 `status` int(11) NULL,
 `time` int(11) NULL,
 `reason` int(11) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_users_transactions` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `sender` int(11) NULL,
 `recipient` int(11) NULL,
 `amount` varchar(255) NULL,
 `currency` varchar(255) NULL,
 `description` varchar(255) NULL,
 `status` int(11) NULL,
 `time` int(11) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_users` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `username` varchar(255) NULL,
 `password` varchar(255) NULL,
 `password_recovery` text NULL,
 `email_verified` int(11) NULL,
 `email_hash` text NULL,
 `email` varchar(255) NULL,
 `status` int(11) NULL,
 `ip` varchar(255) NULL,
 `last_login` int(11) NULL,
 `signup_time` int(11) NULL,
 `document_verified` int(11) NULL,
 `document_1` text NULL,
 `document_2` text NULL,
 `mobile_verified` int(11) NULL,
 `mobile_number` text NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_users_earnings` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `uid` int(11) NULL,
 `amount` varchar(255) NULL,
 `currency` varchar(255) NULL,
 `created` int(11) NULL,
 `updated` int(11) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_users_withdrawals` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `uid` int(11) NULL,
 `eid` int(11) NULL,
 `amount` varchar(255) NULL,
 `currency` varchar(255) NULL,
 `company` varchar(255) NULL,
 `requested_on` int(11) NULL,
 `processed_on` int(11) NULL,
 `status` int(11) NULL,
 `u_field_1` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_2` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_3` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_4` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_5` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_6` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_7` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_8` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_9` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_10` varchar(255) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_sms_codes` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `uid` int(11) NULL,
 `sms_code` varchar(255) NULL,
 `verified` int(11) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_gateways` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `name` varchar(255) NULL,
 `currency` varchar(255) NULL,
 `reserve` varchar(255) NULL,
 `min_amount` varchar(255) NULL,
 `max_amount` varchar(255) NULL,
 `exchange_type` int(11) NULL,
 `include_fee` int(11) NULL,
 `extra_fee` varchar(255) NULL,
 `fee` varchar(255) NULL,
 `allow_send` int(11) NULL,
 `allow_receive` int(11) NULL,
 `default_send` int(11) NULL,
 `default_receive` int(11) NULL,
 `allow_payouts` int(11) NULL,
 `a_field_1` varchar(255) NULL,
 `a_field_2` varchar(255) NULL,
 `a_field_3` varchar(255) NULL, 
 `a_field_4` varchar(255) NULL,
 `a_field_5` varchar(255) NULL,
 `a_field_6` varchar(255) NULL,
 `a_field_7` varchar(255) NULL,
 `a_field_8` varchar(255) NULL,
 `a_field_9` varchar(255) NULL,
 `a_field_10` varchar(255) NULL,
 `status` int(11) NULL,
 `external_gateway` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
 `external_icon` text NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_gateways_fields` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `gateway_id` int(11) NULL,
 `field_name` varchar(255) NULL,
 `field_number` int(11) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_rates` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `gateway_from` int(11) NULL,
 `gateway_to` int(11) NULL,
 `rate_from` varchar(255) NULL,
 `rate_to` varchar(255) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_rates` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `gateway_from` int(11) NULL,
 `gateway_to` int(11) NULL,
 `rate_from` varchar(255) NULL,
 `rate_to` varchar(255) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_exchanges` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `uid` int(11) NULL,
 `wid` int(11) NULL,
 `gateway_send` int(11) NULL,
 `gateway_receive` int(11) NULL,
 `amount_send` varchar(255) NULL,
 `amount_receive` varchar(255) NULL,
 `rate_from` varchar(255) NULL,
 `rate_to` varchar(255) NULL,
 `status` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
 `created` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
 `updated` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
 `expired` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
 `u_field_1` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_2` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_3` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_4` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_5` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_6` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_7` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_8` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_9` varchar(255) NULL,
 `u_field_10` varchar(255) NULL,
 `ip` varchar(255) NULL,
 `transaction_id` text NULL,
 `exchange_id` varchar(255) NULL,
 `referral_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
 `referral_amount` varchar(255) NULL,
 `referral_currency` varchar(255) NULL,
 `referral_status` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_transactions` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `uid` int(11) NULL,
 `transaction_id` text NULL,
 `status` int(11) NULL,
 `gateway` varchar(255) NULL,
 `amount` varchar(255) NULL,
 `currency` varchar(255) NULL,
 `time` int(11) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_testimonials` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `uid` int(11) NULL,
 `type` int(11) NULL,
 `exchange_id` int(11) NULL,
 `status` int(11) NULL,
 `time` int(11) NULL,
 `content` text NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_pages` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `title` varchar(255) NULL,
 `prefix` varchar(255) NULL,
 `content` text NULL,
 `created` int(11) NULL,
 `updated` int(11) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

INSERT INTO `bit_pages` (`id`, `title`, `prefix`, `content`) VALUES
(1, 'Terms of service', 'terms-of-services', 'Edit from WebAdmin.'),
(2, 'Privacy Policy', 'privacy-policy', 'Edit from WebAdmin.'),
(3, 'About', 'about', 'Edit from WebAdmin.');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bit_faq` (
 `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 `question` varchar(255) NULL,
 `answer` text NULL,
 `created` int(11) NULL,
 `updated` int(11) NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;
